title: (x) "Oleg Igorin" typewriter caps - ITC American Typewriter {Michael A}
author: dirtcastle

comments.content: Looks like ITC American Typewriter Medium Alternate.
Typewriter-style slab serif would say it all, I think, as far as a classification.

Thanks both!

In theory it is slabby, yet it has no right angles.

I might call it a "swelled slab".

hhp
